main.title1: Search and booking of creative platforms and services
main.description1: More than 1500 variants of platforms and services in various fields of creative activity
main.description2: Automated booking and cancellation process. No calls or confirmations
main.description4: Cumulative system of discounts and bonuses.

main.title1: Become a part of the only ecosystem of creative platforms and services in Russia
main.desc1: First bookings on the day of publication
main.subtitle1: *our record is 4 minutes from the moment of publication in the service
main.subtitle2: *all other products of the service are free of charge

benefits.title1: MUSbooking is not just another CRM system or an online booking system.
benefits.title2: This is a service that will bring a new customer directly to your schedule at the lowest price.
benefits.subtitle3: An empty slot in your schedule
benefits.stripDesc1: users are looking for sites every day

middle.title1: The widest product line on the market.
middle.subtitle1: Your sites and services will be available for booking in all our products. The catalog, mobile application and booking widget will allow you to sell affordable time and services to the widest possible audience.
middle.subtitle2.1: analysis of bookings and ordered services;
middle.subtitle2.2: editing information about sites and services;
middle.subtitle2.3: flexible customer relations, system of fines, discounts and payment terms;
middle.subtitle3.1: full synchronization with your CRM/ERP platform;
middle.subtitle3.4: personal support and free consultations when publishing;
middle.subtitle3.5: accepting online payments directly to your checking account.

partners.title: More than 500 companies work with us

slider.slider1Desc1: At the very beginning of our work, we used online tables and calendars, then a self-written CRM system, since none of the CRM systems that existed on the market did not cover the tasks and needs of the rehearsal base.
slider.slider1Desc2: The guys from MUSbooking helped with the CRM setup, conducted training for administrators and provided all possible support. The transition to the new CRM was very quick and painless.
slider.slider2Desc1: MUSbooking is the best booking service for creative platforms in Russia.
slider.slider2Desc2: We have been working with them since the launch of the application and for the 3rd year we have been observing the constant and qualitative development of both the external shell and internal capabilities for the partner and the client.
slider.slider2Desc3: We sincerely wish you prosperity and the implementation of new ideas!
slider.slider3Desc1: Quite a convenient and profitable service to attract new customers for our company. The service worked much better than I initially expected.

dbServices.card0: Specially equipped complexes of premises designed for the production of audio products. In this area, you can find a studio for rent or order the necessary service, such as mixing or mastering a song.
dbServices.card1: Sites designed for photo and video filming. In this area you will find specially equipped halls with different designs that will help you realize any of your ideas.
dbServices.card2: Teachers and institutions engaged in teaching creative disciplines are gathered in this field. You will be able to find a teacher in vocal, sound engineering, painting, photography and other creative areas.
dbServices.card3: The halls are specially equipped for practicing any dance directions. The sphere contains halls of various sizes, which are suitable for both rehearsals of large groups and for individual classes.

dbComfortPlace.item1: Less than 10 minutes from the metro

dbCardBenefits.item0: Instant synchronization with any booking channel using socket connections.
dbCardBenefits.item1: A wide range of potential customers due to a larger number of fields of activity.
dbCardBenefits.item2: Publish one platform in several areas and earn income from different directions.
dbCardBenefits.item3: The extensive knowledge base, the experience of our partners and team, will help to work effectively with the service.
dbCardBenefits.item4: You pay % only from the amount of the successful application. No additional payments are required.
dbCardBenefits.item5: All payments for acquiring, refunds and transfers are included in the service commission.
dbCardBenefits.item6: A variety of promotion tools allows you to get 2 times more bookings.
dbCardBenefits.item7: The page of your object in the catalog instantly gets into the top of search engine queries.
dbCardBenefits.item8: A large selection of tools for automating price changes, setting up promotions, discounts and booking conditions.
